title: Party Like It’s 1999: Don’t Go Chasing Waterfalls Edition
description: The number-one song of the land in the summer of 1995 was a meaningful gem from a trio called TLC. Party Like It’s 1999: Don’t Go Chasing Waterfalls Edition will mark that 30th anniversary by giving you double shots of T-Boz, Chilli and Left Eye all night long. Plus DJ Steve will also serve up our usual mix of the best rock, pop, R&B, hip-hop and dance tunes from the 1990s and 2000s!
